src:
Aji Santoso Bertekad Kembalikan Ketajaman David da Silva
02 Nov 2019, 10:04 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya, Aji Santoso bertekad mengembalikan ketajaman bomber asingnya, David Aparecido da Silva. Sehingga pemain asal Brasil tersebut kembali tampil produktif bersama Green Force.
David da Silva diketahui baru mencetak tiga gol dari sembilan penampilannya bersama Persebaya. Padahal, dia merupakan pencetak gol terbanyak kedua pada kompetisi Liga 1 2018.
Menurut Aji, dirinya akan melakukan pendekatan secara khusus dengan David da Silva. Karena dari segi kemampuan, mantan penyerang Bhayangkara FC itu tidak perlu diragukan.
"Nanti saya akan berbicara sama dia, sebenarnya kan pemain ini dasarnya kan tajam, jadi makanya saya lihat ke depannya bagaimana," kata Aji Santoso, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
David da Silva bergabung dengan Persebaya pada bursa transfer paruh musim. Dia menggantikan Amido Balde yang didepak dari skuat karena performanya tidak sesuai harapan.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Aji Santoso Determined to Restore David da Silva's Sharpness
02 Nov 2019, 10:04 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya coach Aji Santoso is determined to restore the sharpness of his foreign bomber, David Aparecido da Silva. So that the Brazilian player returned to appear productive with Green Force.
David da Silva is known to have scored just three goals in nine appearances for Persebaya. In fact, he is the second highest scorer in 2018 League 1 competition.
According to Aji, he will make a special approach with David da Silva. Because in terms of ability, the former striker Bhayangkara FC is not in doubt.
"Later I will talk to him, actually the player is basically sharp, so I will see in the future how," said Aji Santoso, Saturday (11/02/2019).
David da Silva joined Persebaya in the midterm transfer market. He replaces Amido Balde who was kicked out of the squad because his performance was not as expected.
